formattedAddress: 218 W 18th St 6th floor, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 218 W 18th St 6th floor, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
Jonathan was an amazing guide through the harrowing Williamsburg apartment buying process. He was available, knowledgeable, very thoughtful in his advice, and truly smoothed our whole process. He made the extra effort to look into issues we were unsure about and got back to us quickly with information and options to tackle these issues.

My husband and I cannot recommend him enough and we would absolutely turn to him again in the future!

originalText.text:
Jonathan did a great job helping us navigate the apartment hunt process as first-time buyers. He spent time with us upfront to understand our preferences and served up a number of highly relevant listings. By the end of the process, we felt like we had seen basically everything that had met our search criteria.

Once we identified “the one”, Jonathan advised us on the offer strategy and did a great job helping us navigate the wrinkles that inevitable arose through the closing process. He remained highly responsive throughout the process and was genuinely committed to us achieving a successful outcome.

We would definitely recommend Jonathan to anyone looking to buy in the NYC area!

originalText.text: Jonathan and I connected the second we met and I knew instantly he was going to help me find my NYC dream Apartment. Jonathan was not only a professional agent filled with unreal advice, but he quickly became a friend. Jonathan never pressured me into buying anything I wasn’t 110% on. He had a pretty picky customer on his hands and he never gave up on me! I would recommend Jonathan to anyone who’s looking to buy in NYC. In fact, I just recommended him to my brother in law who is now closing on his brand new apartment down the block from me, on the fabulous Upper East Side of Manhattan thanks to Jonathan as well. Jonathan should be your go to agent in NYC!

originalText.text:
I've got to give a big shoutout to Jonathan for the awesome experience he provided when my clients decided to relocate from Philly to Manhattan. Being a fellow real estate agent, I know how tricky interstate moves can be, but working with him was an absolute breeze.

Right off the bat, his professionalism was on point. He kept things crystal clear and totally upfront, which immediately clicked with my clients and calmed their moving jitters.

But here's where he really nailed it: his know-how in the NYC markets. Jonathan seriously aced the Manhattan/Brooklyn real estate scene, schooling my clients on neighborhoods, market vibes, and property values. My clients made some super confident decisions. This guy is the real deal, bringing a whole new level of awesome to the real estate game. Kudos!

originalText.text: Jonathan was amazing at advising me initially and quickly doing additional market research, while the bank was breathing down my neck regarding comps/interest rates.  My mortgage rate on $1MM loan is 2.25% thanks to Jonathan using appropriate comps.  Thank you Jonathan for a quick and favorably termed close on my Chelsea co-op!  Looking forward to doing more business with you in the future! S.Aqeel
